snippet: The private equity firm headed by Stephen A. Schwarzman reported adjusted profit of $450 million for the fourth quarter, topping analysts' estimates of $441.7 million.
abstract: The private equity firm headed by Stephen A. Schwarzman reported adjusted profit of $450 million for the fourth quarter, topping analysts' estimates of $441.7 million.

headline.main: Blackstone's Profit Falls 12%, but Beats Expectations
